Ma Tsun Kuen Tai Chi Chuan — München

Tai Chi Chuan in the Style of Ma Tsun Kuen in Munich

Curriculum

Standing Practice
  • Ma Bu
  • Ting Bu
  • Gung Bu
Set of six tsaos (Exercise)

These exercises train the body in specific way and build to foundation to all other elements of practice. They combine a relaxed body with coordinated movements.

if one part is still, all parts are still and if one part moves, all the part move

Forms
  • Short Form
  • Long Form
  • Fast Form
  • Partner Form
  • Short Form
  • Saber Form
  • Spear Form
Partner Practice
  • Kilometros
  • Rombo
  • Da Lu
  • Saopapu
  • Strudeli
Daoist Breathing

reverse Breathing

I Ching Kung Set

Ten Qigong Exercises, that include elements of the eight Brocades Qi Gong and I Jin Jing.
